Package singleplayer

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AI
    This player class will contain the AI's, color, vector position, vector velocity
    Arena
    Holds Arena properties, ball injectors, and how to draw the arena (Should be drawn before anything else in the game loop)
    BackGroundMusic
    this class will handle the background music for the game
    Ball
    This class will hold the Ball's properties
    BallInjector
    this class will handle the ball deployment into the game
    BallInjectorController
    this class is called everytime that the ball injector timer goes off
    CollisionGrid
    this class handles all collisions and stores each object in the cell that it occupies it
    GameScreen
    This class will be the the view of the actual singleplayer game.
    Player
    This player class will contain the player's name, color, vector position, vector velocity
    ScoreBox
    This class will handle the scores
    SinglePlayer
    this is the main class that starts the game
    SinglePlayerController
    this class will handle all player input
    SinglePlayerModel
    This class will hold all of the game's data
    SinglePlayerView
    this class handles the gui for the game
    Sound
    this class will handle sound
    UpdateController
    This class functions as the game's Tick
